Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
Dear programmers, 

How do you see AI agent that are make average people like me who have zero knowladge in programming to be able to make my own software or web app ?

Author: revwuzhere
Content: i think that what we were gonna capable of, with AI in hand nowadays

Author: petrachristalbert
Content:
I am not sure... I am 100% supportive about this.

My logic is : 

     Instead of building a machine from scrap/raw material, u purchase a processed one and use a guide to assemble it urself. Nothing wrong with that on my eyes.

     But when it comes to a far complicative machine, u either learnt how to craft it ur self or ask for professional service to make sure u didnt do mistake and ended up with loss.

     Dont focus to what people could do with AI, just improve ur self so u are getting better day by day.

Author: revwuzhere
Content: it's like buying lego kit and people are gonna craft something with it, i think

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Hmm okey thanks for the input guys

Author: alicelovesit
Content: I think there are people who provide tech services but they may take a lot of percentage and play law if you’re also inexperienced in the business field. Better hire a lawyer before working with anyone or any company to be safe. But working with tech-related agencies that provides AI generation is an option. I came across a few advertisements but I don’t know if we could trust them yet because AI is still new. Better do your own research too not just ask Chat GPT hahaha

Author: nahdiduta
Content:
Vibe coding is indeed controversial but in most cases, it can work.

So, yeah, you can actually build your web app, with zero technical background. Expect to face bugs though.

Just be sure to still do the clasic ol’ learning by doing. Learn security and optimizations

Those knowledges will help you fix bugs and further fine tune the web app code generated by the ai
